# sha-1
"[0-9a-f]{40}"
# ?
"[0-9a-f]{64}"
# ?
"[0-9a-f]{128}"
# hex digits including css/html color classes:
(?:[\\0][xX]|\\u|[uU]\+|#|\%23)[0-9a-fA-FgGrR]{2,}[uU]?[lL]{0,2}\b
# URL escaped characters
\%[0-9A-F]{2}
# secrets
Secret = "\S+"
"public_key": "\S+"
"bitcoin:[^"]+"
# tests
(?:in|out):\s*"[^"]*"
# ignore long runs of a single character:
\b([A-Za-z])\1{3,}\b
